definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: A Lancaster bomber in reasonable condition is worth rescuing.
sentences.chinese: 一架狀況尚好的蘭開斯特轟炸機值得搶救。

sentences.english: In 1963 a Lancaster bomber crashed on Wallis Island.
sentences.chinese: 1963年，一架蘭開斯特轟炸機在瓦立斯島墜毀。

sentences.english: The Hersheys first lived in Lancaster.
sentences.chinese: 在第一次住在蘭開斯特Hersheys。

sentences.english: Taking advantage of this the Lancaster family staged a comeback and Henry became a banner in recapturing the throne. By marriage with the daugh…
sentences.chinese: 蘭開斯特家族乘勢再起，亨利成爲其重奪王位的旗幟。
